embeds.title: üé¨ How to Request Media
embeds.description: Use the commands below to request movies and TV shows. Your requests will be automatically downloaded and added to our Plex library!

fields.name: üì∫ Request Commands
fields.value:
**`/request sd-hd-movie title`** - Request a movie by title
**`/request sd-hd-tv title`** - Request a TV show by title

Just type the command and enter the movie or show name!

fields.name: üìã Request Process
fields.value:
**1.** Submit your request using one of the commands above
**2.** The request will start downloading automatically
**3.** You'll get pinged in <#1422424099333869611> when it's ready
**4.** Once Plex picks it up, you'll see it in <#1422424099333869612>
**5.** Start watching on Plex!

fields.name: ‚è±Ô∏è How Long Does It Take?
fields.value: Download times vary based on file size and server load. Most content is available within a few hours. Check <#1422424099333869611> for updates on your specific request.

fields.name: üí° Tips
fields.value:
‚Ä¢ Be specific with titles - include the year if there are multiple movies with the same name
‚Ä¢ For TV shows, you'll be prompted to select which season(s) you want
‚Ä¢ Already requested? Check <#1422424099333869611> first to avoid duplicates
‚Ä¢ Can't find it? Ask in <#1426287703225270292> for help

fields.name: ‚ö†Ô∏è Please Be Respectful
fields.value: Storage is expensive! Please be mindful of what you request. Only request content you actually plan to watch, and check if it's already available before requesting multiple seasons.

fields.name: üìö More Info
fields.value:
For more tips and detailed guidance, visit our wiki:
**[Montahulu+ Knowledge Base](https://github.com/sylvieclab/Montahulu-Knowledge-Base/wiki/requests)**

fields.name: ‚ùì Need Help?
fields.value: If you're having trouble with requests, ask in <#1426287703225270292>
